Package io.vertigo.core.node.component

Interface Activeable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ElasticSearchConnector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccountStorePlugin, AppManagerImpl, BerkeleyKVStorePlugin, C3p0ConnectionProviderPlugin, ClientESSearchServicesPlugin, ComponentSpaceWritable, DaemonManagerImpl, DashboardUiManager, DbFileStorePlugin, DbProcessExecutorPlugin, DbProcessSchedulerPlugin, EhCachePlugin, EmbeddedElasticSearchServer, EmbeddedJavalinConnector, EntityStoreManagerImpl, ESGeoSearchPlugin, EthereumLedgerPlugin, EventBusManagerImpl, FsFileStorePlugin, GoogleJsonEngine, HandleManagerImpl, InfluxDbConnector, InfluxDbTimeSeriesPlugin, LdapIdentityProviderPlugin, LoaderAccountStorePlugin, MasterCoordinator, MasterManagerImpl, MemoryCachePlugin, MemoryProcessExecutorPlugin, MemoryProcessSchedulerPlugin, MigrationManagerImpl, MongoClientConnector, MosquittoConnector, Neo4JConnector, Neo4jGPLEmbeddedServer, NodeElasticSearchConnector, OpenOfficeLocalConverterPlugin, OpenOfficeRemoteConverterPlugin, RedisConnector, RestHighLevelElasticSearchConnector, RestHLClientESSearchServicesPlugin, SearchManagerImpl, SecuredTransportSearchConnector, SmartTypeManagerImpl, SocketLoggerAnalyticsConnectorPlugin, StandaloneJavalinConnector, StoreAccountStorePlugin, StoreAuthenticationPlugin, StoreIdentityProviderPlugin, TextAccountStorePlugin, TextAuthenticationPlugin, TextIdentityProviderPlugin, TransportElasticSearchConnector, VSecurityManagerImpl, WebServiceManagerImpl, WorkersManagerImpl
    public interface Activeable
    The Activeable class allows you to provide a behavior to a component. The methods start() and stop() are called after the creation and before the destruction of the managed components.
    Author:
    pchretien

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void start()
      Called after the component has been created and filled by injection (for the components built by configuration).
      void stop()
      Called before the component is stopped.

    • Method Detail

        Called after the component has been created and filled by injection (for the components built by configuration).

      • stop

        void stop()
        Called before the component is stopped.
